id: Video Game Library & Tracker Notion Template [Limitless OS]
name: Video Game Library & Tracker Notion Template [Limitless OS]
description: One of the many awesome mini-templates built into Limitless OS. Check out Limitless OS 3.0 in action:What you can do: Add new video games List your gaming platforms and categorize your games Categorize your games by genre and franchises Keep track of your game progress Add release date and track future games Databases Inside: Games Genres Platforms Franchises Do you have questions?Send your feedback or queries to limitless@previewx.com
features: Add new video games; List your gaming platforms and categorize your games; Categorize your games by genre and franchises; Keep track of your game progress; Add release date and track future games
